overview: Jillian thinks she is being funny by writing "Mr. Anderson has a small dick" on his chalkboard. When he sees what she wrote, he is quick to show her how wrong she is. Jenna wants to get revenge on a fellow classmate who is mean to her. What better way to get revenge than to fuck her hot boyfriend? Kacy keeps distracting Erik from studying. When she starts teasing her pussy in front of him, he drops his homework and occupies his hands with other things. Samantha wants her best friend to get ungrounded. Once her clothes come off, her friend's dad doesn't need much more convincing to do what she wants!
title: Corrupt Schoolgirls 8
